net.hockeyapp.android.internal
Class UpdateView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          android.widget.RelativeLayout
              net.hockeyapp.android.internal.UpdateView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
public class UpdateView
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout

Description

Internal helper class to draw the content view of UpdateActivity and UpdateFragement.
